Class: FrontierClientGA

Class: FrontierClientGA

FrontierClientGA

This class represents a session with Frontier cluster. It manages a persistent connection with one of Frontier servers and exposes a set of APIs to register metrics and publish time series.

new FrontierClientGA(hostAndPort, clientGroup, options)

Creates an instance of Frontier client.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
hostAndPort string

the endpoint of frontier in the form host:port
clientGroup string

spec for Frontier client group; the format is a=b;c=d;e=f
options Object <optional>

additional options that control various aspects of the client behavior.
Author:
  • Yuri Finkelstein

Members

outstandingRequests :SignedInt32RingBuffer

A ring buffer of outstanding requests; maps message_id => request callback

Type:
  • SignedInt32RingBuffer

Methods

close(userInitiatedClose)

Close Frontier connection

Parameters:
Name Type Description
userInitiatedClose

boolean flag, (optional); if not present or is false - the client will attempt to re-open the connection if global option Options.connect_retry is set to true

post(timestampSec, metric_ids, samples, reliability, cb)

Post metric samples for previously registered metrics

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
timestampSec

time, in seconds
metric_ids

array of binary ids returned by FrontierClientGA#register call
samples

array of sample values
reliability PostReliability

reliability level for this request
cb function <optional>

completion callback; receives error or response data

postUnregistered(timestampSec, metric_set, samples, reliability, cb)

Post metric samples without having the metric ids (registration is still performed by the server)

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
timestampSec

time, in seconds
metric_set

a set of metric descriptors (metadata)
samples

array of sample values
reliability PostReliability

reliability level for this request
cb function <optional>

completion callback; receives error or the response from server

register(metric_set, cb)

Register a set of metrics and obtain their Frontier ids.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
metric_set

metric set structure understood by Frontier
cb function <optional>

completion callback; receives request error or the list of registered metric ids
